title: Vaccine Cliff Looms As Numbers Begin To Drop
itunes:title: Vaccine Cliff Looms As Numbers Begin To Drop
description:
Lauren Sauer, Johns Hopkins University Assistant Professor of Emergency Medicine, on the latest news surrounding coronavirus treatments, vaccines, and spread. Logan Mohtashami, Housing Data Analyst and Lead Analyst for HousingWire, on home sales. Randy Frederick, Vice President of Trading and Derivatives at Schwab Center for Financial Research, discusses the latest "Trader Pulse" survey. Senior U.S. Municipals Strategist for Bloomberg Intelligence, Eric Kazatsky, gives us the latest on the municipal bond market. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
